TITLE Thai Meatball Lettuce Wraps
{[Slaw]
# In a bowl combine:{
[14 oz cole slaw mix]
[10 item basil leaves[, chiffonade]]
[5 item mint leaves[, chiffonade]]
[3 tbl cilantro[, chopped]]
[1 item scallion[, sliced]]
[1/4 cup rice vinegar]
[5 tsp mayonnaise]
[4 tsp sweet chili sauce]
}
}
{[Meatballs Mixture]
# In a large bowl combine:{
[1.5 lbs ground pork]
[4 item scallion[, sliced]]
[1 tbl ginger[, minced]]
[2 cloves garlic[, minced]]
[1/2 tbl fish sauce]
[1/2 tsp sriracha]
[1 tsp salt]
[2 tbl lime juice]
}
}

# Preheat oven to 400F degrees.
# On a baking sheet form [1 tbl $[Meatball Mixture]] into rough balls.
# Bake for approximately 10 minutes. Check temperature for 155F degrees.
# Serve on [romaine lettuce] with [sweet chili sauce].
